Eric Schmidt said that although what he called the`` triumvirate approach'' of leadership by himself, Larry Page and Sergey Brin has real benefits, it is time to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability. Eric Schmidt became CEO of Google in July 2001, when he'd already been chairman of the board for several months- Google put him on the board and made him chairman in March of that year.

That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Timeline: African mediation in Ivory Coast Raila Odinga said Gbagbo was not even prepared to discuss quitting power and had twice broken a promise to lift the blockade on Alassane Ouattara 's temporary headquarters. Mr. Raila Odinga failed in his mission and we are no longer prepared to receive him here in Ivory Coast. We reject Mr. Raila Odinga , Gbagbo's foreign minister Alcide Djedje told a press conference.
